text: The braking system shall stop the train within 800 m when the emergency brake is applied at 160 km/h on dry track.
The HMI should display the status quickly and clearly for the driver.
The infusion pump shall deliver 5 mL/h ± 5% for flow rates between 1 mL/h and 10 mL/h at 23°C with saline.
The ECU shall provide diagnostic information if needed.
The navigation solution shall have high accuracy during normal operation.
The navigation solution shall provide position error <= 10 m (95th percentile) in nominal flight conditions.
The system shall prevent unauthorized access to admin functions.
The system shall enforce RBAC such that only ADMIN role can access admin APIs, and all denied attempts are logged with user_id, timestamp and source IP.
The onboard unit shall exchange messages with wayside within 200 ms.
The onboard unit shall exchange messages with wayside within 200 ms in all conditions.
The device shall raise an audible alarm when occlusion is detected.
The device shall raise an audible alarm within 2 seconds of occlusion detection, with sound pressure level >= 60 dBA at 1 meter.
The ECU shall store at least 50 DTCs.
The ECU shall store DTCs reliably.
The modem shall support data rate up to 20 Mbps.
The modem shall support data rate up to 20 Mbps with low jitter.
The software shall be updatable in the field.
The software shall support OTA update with rollback such that if update fails, system returns to previous version within 5 minutes without loss of configuration.
The system shall be safe.
The system shall demonstrate compliance with EN 50128 with evidence package including requirements, traceability, tests, and safety case artifacts.
